theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Oxidative Stress and Inflammation-Driven Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: This theory emphasizes oxidative stress, chronic inflammation, and protease imbalance driving cellular senescence in COPD lung aging.

theory_assignments.reasoning: Placental aging driven by ROS, DNA damage, and SASP-mediated inflammation fits oxidative stress and inflammatory senescence mechanisms.

theory_assignments.reasoning: Osteoblast dysfunction caused by ROS, DNA damage, and telomere shortening aligns with oxidative stress and inflammation-induced senescence.

theory_assignments.reasoning: Suppression of canonical inflammatory SASP in Spalax highlights modulation of oxidative stress and inflammatory pathways in senescence.

theory_assignments.reasoning: Nox4-driven ROS production and bioenergetic dysfunction causing senescence links to oxidative stress and inflammation mechanisms.

theory_assignments.reasoning: Neurodegenerative disease linked to senescence-associated inflammation, mitochondrial dysfunction, and SASP fits this oxidative stress/inflammation cluster.

theory_assignments.reasoning: Immunosenescence driven by SASP and chronic inflammation aligns with oxidative stress and inflammatory senescence mechanisms.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Tumor Suppression and Cell Cycle Arrest-Centric Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focus on senescence as a tumor suppressor mechanism and irreversible cell cycle arrest fits this tumor suppression and cell cycle arrest cluster.

theory_assignments.reasoning: p63 regulation of senescence and aging via cell cycle arrest and tumor suppressor pathways fits tumor suppression and cell cycle arrest.

theory_assignments.reasoning: p53 hyperactivity causing premature aging via cell cycle arrest and tumor suppression fits this cluster.

theory_assignments.reasoning: p16INK4a-mediated senescence causing cell cycle arrest and regenerative decline fits tumor suppressor and cell cycle arrest mechanisms.

theory_assignments.reasoning: Replicative senescence in CD8+ T cells driven by telomere shortening fits replicative senescence and telomere attrition cluster.

theory_assignments.reasoning: Replicative senescence of T cells due to telomere shortening and Hayflick limit fits replicative senescence cluster.

theory_assignments.reasoning: Focus on SASP, senescent cell heterogeneity, and dual roles in physiology and pathology fits SASP and senescent cell heterogeneity cluster.

theory_assignments.reasoning: Metabolic features and regulation in senescence including SASP and metabolic switches fits SASP and senescent cell heterogeneity cluster.

theory_assignments.reasoning: Senescent cell immunoevasion via SASP factors and MMP-mediated ligand shedding fits SASP and senescent cell heterogeneity cluster.

theory_assignments.reasoning: Lamin B1 depletion causing chromatin reconfiguration and gene expression changes driving senescence fits chromatin remodeling cluster.

theory_assignments.reasoning: DDR activation in neurons leading to senescence-like state and neuroinflammation fits DDR-induced neuronal senescence cluster.
